verses.verse: וַיַּ֥עַן <WH6030> answered אֱלִיה֗וּא <WH453> Furthermore Elihu וַיֹּאמַֽר׃ <WH559> and said
שִׁמְע֣וּ <WH8085> Hear חֲכָמִ֣ים <WH2450> O ye wise מִלָּ֑י <WH4405> my words וְ֝יֹדְעִ֗ים <WH3045> unto me ye that have knowledge הַאֲזִ֥ינוּ <WH238> [men] and give ear לִֽי׃
כִּי־ <WH3588> For אֹ֭זֶן <WH241> For the ear מִלִּ֣ין <WH4405> words תִּבְחָ֑ן <WH974> trieth וְ֝חֵ֗ךְ <WH2441> as the mouth יִטְעַ֥ם <WH2938> tasteth לֶאֱכֹֽל׃ <WH398> meat
מִשְׁפָּ֥ט <WH4941> to us judgment נִבְחֲרָה־ <WH977> Let us choose לָּ֑נוּ נֵדְעָ֖ה <WH3045> let us know בֵינֵ֣ינוּ <WH996> among מַה־ <WH4100> what טּֽוֹב׃ <WH2896> among ourselves what [is] good
כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for אָ֭מַר <WH559> hath said אִיּ֣וֹב <WH347> For Job צָדַ֑קְתִּי <WH6663> I am righteous וְ֝אֵ֗ל <WH410> and God הֵסִ֥יר <WH5493> hath taken away מִשְׁפָּטִֽי׃ <WH4941> my judgment

עַל־ <WH5921> concerning מִשְׁפָּטִ֥י <WH4941> adversary אֲכַזֵּ֑ב <WH3576> Should I lie אָנ֖וּשׁ <WH605> [is] incurable חִצִּ֣י <WH2671> archer בְלִי־ <WH1097> without פָֽשַׁע׃ <WH6588> without transgression
מִי־ <WH4310> What גֶ֥בֶר <WH1397> What man כְּאִיּ֑וֹב <WH347> [is] like Job יִֽשְׁתֶּה־ <WH8354> [who] drinketh up לַּ֥עַג <WH3933> scorning כַּמָּֽיִם׃ <WH4325> water

וְאָרַ֣ח <WH732> Which goeth לְ֭חֶבְרָה <WH2274> in company עִם־ <WH5973> with פֹּ֣עֲלֵי <WH6466> with the workers אָ֑וֶן <WH205> of iniquity וְ֝לָלֶ֗כֶת <WH1980> and walks עִם־ <WH5973> with אַנְשֵׁי־ <WH376> with רֶֽשַׁע׃ <WH7562> with wicked

כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for אָ֭מַר <WH559> For he hath said לֹ֣א <WH3808> nothing יִסְכָּן־ <WH5532> It profiteth גָּ֑בֶר <WH1397> a man בִּ֝רְצֹת֗וֹ <WH7521> nothing that he should delight עִם־ <WH5973> with אֱלֹהִֽים׃ <WH430> himself with God

לָכֵ֤ן ׀ <WH3651> Therefore אַ֥נֲשֵׁ֥י <WH376> men לֵבָ֗ב <WH3824> of understanding שִׁמְע֫וּ <WH8085> Therefore hearken לִ֥י חָלִ֖לָה <WH2486> far be it לָאֵ֥ל <WH410> from God מֵרֶ֗שַׁע <WH7562> [that he should do] wickedness וְשַׁדַּ֥י <WH7706> and [from] the Almighty מֵעָֽוֶל׃ <WH5766> [that he should commit] iniquity

כִּ֤י <WH3588> according פֹ֣עַל <WH6467> For the work אָ֭דָם <WH120> of a man יְשַׁלֶּם־ <WH7999> shall he render ל֑וֹ וּֽכְאֹ֥רַח <WH734> according to [his] ways אִ֝֗ישׁ <WH376> unto him and cause every man יַמְצִאֶֽנּוּ׃ <WH4672> to find

אַף־ <WH637> Yea אָמְנָ֗ם <WH551> Yea surely אֵ֥ל <WH410> God לֹֽא־ <WH3808> will not יַרְשִׁ֑יעַ <WH7561> will not do wickedly וְ֝שַׁדַּ֗י <WH7706> neither will the Almighty לֹֽא־ <WH3808> will not יְעַוֵּ֥ת <WH5791> pervert מִשְׁפָּֽט׃ <WH4941> judgment

מִֽי־ <WH4310> Who פָקַ֣ד <WH6485> Who hath given him a charge עָלָ֣יו <WH5921> over אָ֑רְצָה <WH776> common וּמִ֥י <WH4310> Who שָׂ֝֗ם <WH7760> has laid תֵּבֵ֥ל <WH8398> confusion כֻּלָּֽהּ׃ <WH3605> the whole

אִם־ <WH518> If יָשִׂ֣ים <WH7760> If he set אֵלָ֣יו <WH413> about לִבּ֑וֹ <WH3820> his heart רוּח֥וֹ <WH7307> unto himself his spirit וְ֝נִשְׁמָת֗וֹ <WH5397> and his breath אֵלָ֥יו <WH413> to יֶאֱסֹֽף׃ <WH622> upon man [if] he gather

יִגְוַ֣ע <WH1478> shall perish כָּל־ <WH3605> All בָּשָׂ֣ר <WH1320> All flesh יָ֑חַד <WH3162> together וְ֝אָדָ֗ם <WH120> and man עַל־ <WH5921> unto עָפָ֥ר <WH6083> unto dust יָשֽׁוּב׃ <WH7725> shall turn again

וְאִם־ <WH518> if בִּ֥ינָה <WH998> If now [thou hast] understanding שִׁמְעָה־ <WH8085> hear זֹּ֑את <WH2063> likewise הַ֝אֲזִ֗ינָה <WH238> this hearken לְק֣וֹל <WH6963> to the voice מִלָּֽי׃ <WH4405> of my words

הַאַ֬ף <WH637> yet שׂוֹנֵ֣א <WH8130> Shall even he that hateth מִשְׁפָּ֣ט <WH4941> right יַחֲב֑וֹשׁ <WH2280> govern וְאִם־ <WH518> lo צַדִּ֖יק <WH6662> the righteous כַּבִּ֣יר <WH3524> him that is most תַּרְשִֽׁיעַ׃ <WH7561> ? and wilt thou condemn
הַאֲמֹ֣ר <WH559> [Is it fit] to say לְמֶ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> to a king בְּלִיָּ֑עַל <WH1100> Worthless רָ֝שָׁ֗ע <WH7563> Wicked אֶל־ <WH413> about נְדִיבִֽים׃ <WH5081> free

אֲשֶׁ֤ר <WH834> Who לֹֽא־ <WH3808> no נָשָׂ֨א ׀ <WH5375> [How much less to him] that accepteth פְּנֵ֥י <WH6440> not the persons שָׂרִ֗ים <WH8269> of princes וְלֹ֣א <WH3808> Nor נִכַּר־ <WH5234> nor regardeth שׁ֭וֹעַ <WH7771> the rich לִפְנֵי־ <WH6440> more than דָ֑ל <WH1800> the poor כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for מַעֲשֵׂ֖ה <WH4639> are the work יָדָ֣יו <WH3027> of his hands כֻּלָּֽם׃ <WH3605> all

רֶ֤גַע ׀ <WH7281> In a moment יָמֻתוּ֮ <WH4191> shall they die וַחֲצ֪וֹת <WH2676> mid לָ֥יְלָה <WH3915> night יְגֹעֲשׁ֣וּ <WH1607> shall be troubled עָ֣ם <WH5971> and the people וְיַעֲבֹ֑רוּ <WH5674> and pass away וְיָסִ֥ירוּ <WH5493> shall be taken away אַ֝בִּ֗יר <WH47> and the mighty לֹ֣א <WH3808> without בְיָֽד׃ <WH3027> without hand

כִּי־ <WH3588> For עֵ֭ינָיו <WH5869> For his eyes עַל־ <WH5921> are upon דַּרְכֵי־ <WH1870> [are] upon the ways אִ֑ישׁ <WH376> of man וְֽכָל־ <WH3605> all צְעָדָ֥יו <WH6806> all his goings יִרְאֶֽה׃ <WH7200> and he seeth

אֵֽין־ <WH369> There חֹ֭שֶׁךְ <WH2822> [There is] no darkness וְאֵ֣ין <WH369> is no צַלְמָ֑וֶת <WH6757> nor shadow of death לְהִסָּ֥תֶר <WH5641> may hide שָׁ֝֗ם <WH8033> Where פֹּ֣עֲלֵי <WH6466> where the workers אָֽוֶן׃ <WH205> of iniquity

כִּ֤י <WH3588> for לֹ֣א <WH3808> not עַל־ <WH5921> and אִ֭ישׁ <WH376> upon man יָשִׂ֣ים <WH7760> For he will not lay ע֑וֹד <WH5750> further לַהֲלֹ֥ךְ <WH1980> more [than right] that he should enter אֶל־ <WH413> before אֵ֝֗ל <WH410> with God בַּמִּשְׁפָּֽט׃ <WH4941> into judgment

יָרֹ֣עַ <WH7489> He shall break in pieces כַּבִּירִ֣ים <WH3524> mighty men לֹא־ <WH3808> without חֵ֑קֶר <WH2714> without number וַיַּעֲמֵ֖ד <WH5975> and set אֲחֵרִ֣ים <WH312> others תַּחְתָּֽם׃ <WH8478> their place

לָכֵ֗ן <WH3651> Therefore יַ֭כִּיר <WH5234> Therefore he knoweth מַעְבָּֽדֵיהֶ֑ם <WH4566> their works וְהָ֥פַךְ <WH2015> and he overturneth לַ֝֗יְלָה <WH3915> [them] in the night וְיִדַּכָּֽאוּ׃ <WH1792> so that they are destroyed
תַּֽחַת־ <WH8478> them as רְשָׁעִ֥ים <WH7563> wicked men סְפָקָ֗ם <WH5606> He striketh בִּמְק֥וֹם <WH4725> in the open רֹאִֽים׃ <WH7200> sight

אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> after עַל־ <WH5921> and כֵּ֭ן <WH3651> after that סָ֣רוּ <WH5493> Because they turned back מֵֽאַחֲרָ֑יו <WH310> from him וְכָל־ <WH3605> any דְּ֝רָכָ֗יו <WH1870> any of his ways לֹ֣א <WH3808> no הִשְׂכִּֽילוּ׃ <WH7919> and would not consider

לְהָבִ֣יא <WH935> to come עָ֭לָיו <WH5921> and צַֽעֲקַת־ <WH6818> So that they cause the cry דָּ֑ל <WH1800> of the poor וְצַעֲקַ֖ת <WH6818> the cry עֲנִיִּ֣ים <WH6041> of the afflicted יִשְׁמָֽע׃ <WH8085> unto him and he heareth

וְה֤וּא <WH1931> He יַשְׁקִ֨ט ׀ <WH8252> When he giveth quietness וּמִ֥י <WH4310> who יַרְשִׁ֗עַ <WH7561> who then can make trouble וְיַסְתֵּ֣ר <WH5641> ? and when he hideth פָּ֭נִים <WH6440> [his] face וּמִ֣י <WH4310> who יְשׁוּרֶ֑נּוּ <WH7789> who then can behold וְעַל־ <WH5921> regard גּ֖וֹי <WH1471> him? whether [it be done] against a nation וְעַל־ <WH5921> regard אָדָ֣ם <WH120> or against a man יָֽחַד׃ <WH3162> only
מִ֭מְּלֹךְ <WH4427> reign אָדָ֥ם <WH120> men חָנֵ֗ף <WH2611> godless מִמֹּ֥קְשֵׁי <WH4170> be ensnared עָֽם׃ <WH5971> not lest the people כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for אֶל־ <WH413> to
אֵ֭ל <WH410> unto God הֶאָמַ֥ר <WH559> Surely it is meet to be said נָשָׂ֗אתִי <WH5375> I have borne לֹ֣א <WH3808> I will not אֶחְבֹּֽל׃ <WH2254> [chastisement] I will not offend

בִּלְעֲדֵ֣י <WH1107> not אֶ֭חֱזֶה <WH2372> [That which] I see אַתָּ֣ה <WH859> you הֹרֵ֑נִי <WH3384> teach אִֽם־ <WH518> If עָ֥וֶל <WH5766> iniquity פָּ֝עַ֗לְתִּי <WH6466> thou me if I have done לֹ֣א <WH3808> I will not אֹסִֽיף׃ <WH3254> I will do

הַֽמֵעִמְּךָ֬ <WH5973> your terms יְשַׁלְמֶ֨נָּה <WH7999> [Should it be] according to thy mind? he will recompense כִּֽי־ <WH3588> because מָאַ֗סְתָּ <WH3988> have rejected כִּי־ <WH3588> because אַתָּ֣ה <WH859> you תִבְחַ֣ר <WH977> or whether thou choose וְלֹא־ <WH3808> not אָ֑נִי <WH589> I וּֽמַה־ <WH4100> what יָדַ֥עְתָּ <WH3045> what thou knowest דַבֵּֽר׃ <WH1696> and not I therefore speak
אַנְשֵׁ֣י <WH582> Let men לֵ֭בָב <WH3824> of understanding יֹ֣אמְרוּ <WH559> tell לִ֑י וְגֶ֥בֶר <WH1397> man חָ֝כָ֗ם <WH2450> me and let a wise שֹׁמֵ֥עַֽ <WH8085> hearken לִֽי׃

אִ֭יּוֹב <WH347> Job לֹא־ <WH3808> without בְדַ֣עַת <WH1847> without knowledge יְדַבֵּ֑ר <WH1696> hath spoken וּ֝דְבָרָ֗יו <WH1697> and his words לֹ֣א <WH3808> are without בְהַשְׂכֵּֽיל׃ <WH7919> [were] without wisdom

אָבִ֗י <WH15> desire יִבָּחֵ֣ן <WH974> may be tried אִיּ֣וֹב <WH347> [is that] Job עַד־ <WH5704> against נֶ֑צַח <WH5331> unto the end עַל־ <WH5921> Because תְּ֝שֻׁבֹ֗ת <WH8666> because of [his] answers בְּאַנְשֵׁי־ <WH376> men אָֽוֶן׃ <WH205> for wicked

כִּ֥י <WH3588> for יֹ֘סִ֤יף <WH3254> For he addeth עַֽל־ <WH5921> unto חַטָּאת֣וֹ <WH2403> unto his sin פֶ֭שַׁע <WH6588> rebellion בֵּינֵ֣ינוּ <WH996> among יִסְפּ֑וֹק <WH5606> he clappeth וְיֶ֖רֶב <WH7235> [his hands] among us and multiplieth אֲמָרָ֣יו <WH561> his words לָאֵֽל׃ <WH410> against God ס
